home.aboutText:
Data Scientist and GEN AI developer based in Paris, France.

Create digital tools and business solutions across web, UX/UI, and explore visual storytelling through photography and video, often after a gravel ride
home.toolsSubtitle: Explore my collection of utility tools and applications.
home.footerBuilt: Built with <3 in Vue.js & Tailwind CSS

toolbox.title: TOOLS COLLECTION
toolbox.subtitle: A curated set of small, purposeful tools

hawkMcp.title: HAWK MCP
hawkMcp.desc: A powerful local AI orchestrator using MCP (Model Context Protocol) and Ollama. Runs entirely offline on your machine, providing a terminal-based assistant that can control your system, manage files, launch apps, and more.
hawkMcp.figcaption: Terminal-based AI assistant with system control

hawkMobile.title: HAWK AI MOBILE
hawkMobile.desc: A lightweight personal assistant mobile app built with React Native and Expo, powered by Google's Gemini AI. Features a clean, modern chat interface with customizable themes and multi-language support.

pixelWidgets.title: GOOGLE PIXEL WIDGETS
pixelWidgets.desc: A collection of Android Home Screen widgets inspired by the Pixel aesthetic, built using Jetpack Glance.

pdf.title: PDF TOOLS
pdf.desc: Compress, split, and extract PDF pages. Fast and local.

tictactoe.title: TIC TAC TOE
tictactoe.desc: A minimal Tic Tac Toe to unwind on the go. Play against a friend or the computer.

flipcoin.title: FLIP COIN
flipcoin.desc: A playful 3D coin to help you decide. Heads or tails?

rag.title: RAG CHATBOT
rag.desc: Ask your documents questions with vector search and an LLMâ€‘powered assistant.
